title: Mino T Speaker with Carabiner—Red
description:
Mino T portable speaker is the best for loud sound on the go. With built in carabiner, the speaker can be clipped to a backpack, a bike or anywhere you can hook it. Never miss your favorite song or best play of the game again.

  • Dimensions: 2.08 x 1.14 x 3.81 in.
  • Bluetooth® speaker with integrated carabiner - 5W - Pairable via TWS
  • Hands-free mic; selfie control; water resistance IPX4
  • 5h playtime, 2h charging time
  • Rechargeable on USB-C port (cable included)
